verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: By the fig and the olive.
We created man in the best design.
Then, We returned him to the lowest of the low.
Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, they will have an unending reward.
What then makes you deny the Recompense?
Isn’t God the Wisest of judges?
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: Isn’t Allah the Wisest of judges?
